languages.text: "Были и те, кто сопротивлялся... их хватали, связывали, а затем... а затем их импланты предавали ереси! Я сам видел, как безумцы, бывшие моими техносоратниками, нарочно подключали несчастных к оскверненным {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}когитаторам{/g}... как заражали их мусорным кодом..."

traits.locale_text: "Были и те, кто сопротивлялся... их хватали, связывали, а затем... а затем их импланты предавали ереси! Я сам видел, как безумцы, бывшие моими технобратьями, нарочно подключали несчастных к оскверненным {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}когитаторам{/g}... как заражали их мусорным кодом..."

languages.text: "Some of them resisted... The others grabbed them, tied them up, and then... and then they turned their implants to heresy! I saw the madmen, my former tech-comrades, deliberately connect those poor souls to corrupted {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitators{/g}... I watched as they were infected with the scrap-code..."
languages.original_text: "Были и те, кто сопротивлялся... их хватали, связывали, а затем... а затем их импланты предавали ереси! Я сам видел, как безумцы, бывшие моими техносоратниками, нарочно подключали несчастных к оскверненным {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}когитаторам{/g}... как заражали их мусорным кодом..."

traits.locale_text: "Some of them resisted... The others grabbed them, tied them up, and then... and then they turned their implants to heresy! I saw the madmen, my former tech-brethren, deliberately connect those poor souls to corrupted cogitators... I watched as they were infected with the scrap code..."

"Some of them resisted... The others grabbed them, tied them up, and then... and then they turned their implants to heresy! I saw the madmen, my former tech-brethren, deliberately connect those poor souls to corrupted cogitators... I watched as they were infected with the scrap code..."

"Some of them resisted... The others grabbed them, tied them up, and then... and then they turned their implants to heresy! I saw the madmen, my former tech-brethren, deliberately connect those poor souls to corrupted cogitators... I watched as they were infected with the scrap code..."

"Some of them resisted... The others grabbed them, tied them up, and then... and then they turned their implants to heresy! I saw the madmen, my former tech-brethren, deliberately connect those poor souls to corrupted {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitators{/g}... I watched as they were infected with the scrap-code..."

"Some of them resisted... The others grabbed them, tied them up, and then... and then they turned their implants to heresy! I saw the madmen, my former tech-comrades, deliberately connect those poor souls to corrupted {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitators{/g}... I watched as they were infected with the scrap-code..."

languages.text: “其中一部分人拼死抵抗……那些人抓住他们，把他们捆了起来，之后……之后用异端邪说腐化了他们的植入物！我见过那些疯子，他们都是我曾经的技术伙伴。他们故意把那些可怜人的灵魂连接到被腐化的{g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}沉思者{/g}上……我眼睁睁看着那些人遭到了废码的感染……”
languages.original_text: "Some of them resisted... The others grabbed them, tied them up, and then... and then they turned their implants to heresy! I saw the madmen, my former tech-comrades, deliberately connect those poor souls to corrupted {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitators{/g}... I watched as they were infected with the scrap-code..."

traits.locale_text: “其中一部分人拼死抵抗……那些人抓住他们，把他们捆了起来，之后……之后用异端邪说腐化了他们的植入物！我见过那些疯子，他们都是我曾经的技术伙伴。他们故意把那些可怜人的灵魂连接到被腐化的{g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}思考器{/g}上……我眼睁睁看着那些人遭到了废码的感染……”

languages.text: «Algunos se resistieron... y los demás los atraparon, los ataron y... ¡y convirtieron sus implantes en herejías! Vi a los locos, mis antiguos tecnocamaradas, conectar intencionadamente a esas pobres almas a los {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitadores{/g} corruptos... Observé mientras les infectaban con el código de chatarra...».
languages.original_text: "Some of them resisted... The others grabbed them, tied them up, and then... and then they turned their implants to heresy! I saw the madmen, my former tech-comrades, deliberately connect those poor souls to corrupted {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitators{/g}... I watched as they were infected with the scrap-code..."

traits.locale_text: «Algunos se resistieron... y los demás los atraparon, los ataron y... ¡y convirtieron sus implantes en herejías! Vi a los locos, mis antiguos tecnocamaradas, conectar intencionadamente a esas pobres almas a los {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitadores{/g} corruptos... Observé mientras les infectaban con el código de chatarra...».

languages.text: 「何人かは抵抗しましたが…他の者たちは彼らを捕まえ、縛り上げ、そして…彼らのインプラントを異端のものに変えたのです！私は、かつての技術同胞である狂人たちが、哀れな魂たちを堕落した{g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}考算機{/g}に意図的に接続するのを見ました…そして、彼らが破壊コードに感染していくのを見たのです…」
languages.original_text: "Some of them resisted... The others grabbed them, tied them up, and then... and then they turned their implants to heresy! I saw the madmen, my former tech-comrades, deliberately connect those poor souls to corrupted {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitators{/g}... I watched as they were infected with the scrap-code..."

traits.locale_text: 「何人かは抵抗しましたが…他の者たちは彼らを捕まえ、縛り上げ、そして…彼らのインプラントを異端のものに変えたのです！私は、かつての技術同胞である狂人たちが、哀れな魂たちを堕落した{g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}考算機{/g}に意図的に接続するのを見ました…そして、彼らが破壊コードに感染していくのを見たのです…」

languages.text: "Einige von ihnen haben widerstanden ... Die anderen packten und fesselten sie und dann ... dienten ihre Implantate der Ketzerei! Ich habe gesehen, wie die Wahnsinnigen, meine vormaligen Tech-Kameraden, diese armen Seelen an korrumpierte {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}Cogitatoren{/g} angeschlossen haben ... Ich habe zugesehen, wie sie mit Schadcode infiziert wurden ..."
languages.original_text: "Some of them resisted... The others grabbed them, tied them up, and then... and then they turned their implants to heresy! I saw the madmen, my former tech-comrades, deliberately connect those poor souls to corrupted {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitators{/g}... I watched as they were infected with the scrap-code..."

traits.locale_text: "Einige von ihnen haben widerstanden ... Die anderen packten packten und fesselten sie und dann ... dienten ihre Implantate der Ketzerei! Ich habe gesehen, wie die Wahnsinnigen, meine vormaligen Tech-Kameraden, diese armen Seelen an korrumpierte {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}Cogitatoren{/g} angeschlossen haben ... Ich habe zugesehen, wie sie mit Schadcode infiziert wurden ..."

languages.text: « Certains ont résisté... Les autres se sont saisis d'eux, les ont ligotés et ensuite... ensuite, ils ont exposé leurs implants à l'hérésie ! J'ai vu mes anciens technoconfrères devenus fous connecter délibérément ces pauvres hères à des {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitateurs{/g} corrompus... J'ai assisté au moment où l'anticode les a infectés... »
languages.original_text: "Some of them resisted... The others grabbed them, tied them up, and then... and then they turned their implants to heresy! I saw the madmen, my former tech-comrades, deliberately connect those poor souls to corrupted {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitators{/g}... I watched as they were infected with the scrap-code..."

traits.locale_text: « Certains ont résisté... Les autres se sont saisis d'eux, les ont ligotés et ensuite... ensuite, ils ont exposé leurs implants à l'hérésie ! J'ai vu mes anciens technoconfrères devenus fous connecter délibérément ces pauvres hères à des {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitateurs{/g} corrompus... J'ai assisté au moment où l'anticode les a infectés... »

languages.text: "Bazıları direnmeye çalıştı... Sonra bunları alıp bağladılar... Sonra da implantlarına kâfirlik ektiler! Daha evvel tekno yoldaşım olan o delilerin, zavallıları bile isteye yozlaşmış {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}kavramsayarlara{/g} bağlayışını gördüm... Hurda kodunu onlara bulaştırışlarını izledim..."
languages.original_text: "Some of them resisted... The others grabbed them, tied them up, and then... and then they turned their implants to heresy! I saw the madmen, my former tech-comrades, deliberately connect those poor souls to corrupted {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitators{/g}... I watched as they were infected with the scrap-code..."

traits.locale_text: “Bazıları direnmeye çalıştı... Sonra bunları alıp bağladılar... Sonra da implantlarına kâfirlik ektiler! Delilerin, daha evvel tekno yoldaşım olanların, o zavallıları bile isteye yozlaşmış {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}kavramsayarlar{/g}a bağlayışını gördüm... Hurda kodunu onlara bulaştırışlarını izledim...”
